name: Metal Ruler with Cork Backing 6+12+18 Inch Stainless Steel Metal Ruler Non-Slip Rulers with Inch and Centimeters Straight Edge Cork Base Rulers for Drafting Office Tools, Prevent Ink Leakage
short_description: Versatile Sizes for Every Task: This set includes 3 metal rulers with cork backing, designed to meet all your measuring needs. The sizes are 6 inches (15 cm), 12 inches (30 cm), and 18 inches (45 cm), making them ideal for both small-scale and large-scale projects.

Durable, High-Quality Construction: Crafted from premium stainless steel with cork backing, these non-slip rulers with inches and centimeters are built to last. They resist rust, corrosion, bending, and warping, ensuring long-term reliability and structural integrity.

Accurate and Clear Measurements: Featuring precisely etched and paint-filled markings, these straight-edge cork base rulers provide both inch and metric measurements that are easy to read. The slip-resistant cork backing ensures stability and prevents ink seepage for accurate results.

Safe and Convenient Design: The stainless steel metal ruler has smooth, right-angled, or rounded edges to prevent splinters and scratches. Each ruler includes hanging holes for easy storage, making them perfect for students, teachers, and professionals.

Wide Range of Applications: Suitable for home, school, and professional use, these metal rulers are indispensable for architects, designers, engineers, and DIY enthusiasts. They excel in cutting, drawing, and measuring tasks, applicable to materials like canvas, wood, glass, and more.

name: Westcott Stainless Steel Ruler, Zero-Center Scale with Non-Slip Cork Backing, Back-to-School, School Supplies, Classroom Supplies, 24-Inch
short_description: Metal Ruler Durability - Built from rugged stainless steel, this metal straight edge ruler delivers long-lasting precision by resisting wear and bending, ensuring consistent measurements for drafting, design projects, education tasks, and more

Centering Ruler Precision - Zero-center scale enables measurements to radiate evenly from the center, turning this 24-inch ruler into a centering ruler that improves balance in layouts, engineering drawings, and large-format sketches
Flexible - The flexible ruler design lets you map measurements on curved surfaces without compromising accuracy, enabling curved sketches and complex drafting tasks while maintaining legibility

Non-Slip Ruler Traction - This cork-back ruler provides a stable grip on any work surface, minimizing shifts during marking and measurement, which translates to cleaner lines and dependable results in design studios, classrooms, and labs

Storage Convenience - Hang-hole and wall-mount friendly design keeps the 24-inch metal ruler with cork backing neatly stored between projects, ready for rapid access while preserving desk space and surface protection
product_description: Westcott Zero-Center steel ruler delivers durable, precise measurements for drafting tools, drawing, engineering, and education. Constructed from durable stainless steel, this 24-inch long ruler remains accurate with heavy daily use in studios and classrooms. The zero-center scale lets measurements radiate evenly from the center, supporting balance in layouts and serving as a center finding ruler for aligned drafts. Etched 1/16-inch and metric markings provide crisp, legible readings for professional results on flat or curved surfaces. A flexible design accommodates curved edges without sacrificing accuracy, ideal for architectural sketches and CAD work. The cork-backed surface minimizes slips, keeping hands steady during marking. A hang-hole adds storage convenience, ensuring the tool stays within reach between projects. For reliable straight edge performance, this ruler with cork backing is built to endure, meeting the needs of students, designers, engineers, and makers who demand long-lasting precision.
